website_summaries.verdict: A fun and comfortable costume that you can build off, but prepare to add a cape or something else to it to cover up the back.
pros: Set includes one bacon tunic and one egg tunic
These fit most body types and are comfortable
Works well on their own or as a great costume base (such as Deviled Egg and Canadian Bacon)
cons: Many of these come with creases from folding them, which you may have to steam out

customer_reviews.title: Fit my plus size and was cheap and funny
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this Halloween costume is great. I think it will only last one night, but it only needs to last one night. The price made it totally worth it. My husband and I are excited to wear these "easy-to-wear" costumes to our adult party. Minimal dressing up for us. I also liked that it fit my husband, size 36, and me, a size 16/18.
customer_reviews.author: drwends

customer_reviews.title: Great price, lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this set is a great addition to any couples costume closet. Everybody was commenting on them throughout the night. And whenever we were separated For the price this that is a great addition to any couples costume closet. Everybody was commenting on them throughout the night. And whenever we were separated everybody knew where the other one was and would point It out. Yes they are cheap. But still well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Edited Visions

customer_reviews.title: Nice Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Neither my husband or I are big costume people, but these seemed pretty easy and fun. They fit pretty well, mine was a bit long as I am only 5'4" but with heels it was perfect. I read a bunch of reviews about wrinkles; we have a hand steamer that we travel with which took the wrinkles out in 10 minutes, easy. My husband did get wine all over his, so I will try to spot clean it and see if that works. We got really great feedback at the party we went to, people thought the costumes were great! I mean really, who doesn't love bacon?
customer_reviews.author: Darelian

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i'd expected
customer_reviews.text: not the greatest costumes in the world, but quick and easy and funny. these are "two dimensional" costumes that are cloth-covered foam in the front and simple cloth smocks in the back. detailing is minimal. ironically, i this 2-costume set was cheaper than just the bacon costume that i'd been considering. so it was like two-for-one. :) the difficult part was finding someone willing to be the egg ...
customer_reviews.author: Rev Otter

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for an easy couples costume. I was 9 months pregnant (baby born 5 days later) and the egg costume fit with room to spare. I am normally a size 16 when not pregnant, so it really does have plenty of room. The fabric is a bit cheap, but it's standard for Halloween costumes.
customer_reviews.author: Kwalt

customer_reviews.title: I plan on many uses for this costume as it is easy to add a couple things to make it a ...
customer_reviews.text: This costume set was a hit! I can't count how many people said "bacon" when we walked by. The comments about steaming the costumes to remove wrinkles and creases were spot on. I hung them in the bathroom while showering and that did the trick. I plan on many uses for this costume as it is easy to add a couple things to make it a different costume.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable costume ever
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say the quality is necessarily 5 stars, but for the price it surely is! This comes packaged with both costumes, which is great. You can wear these costumes with just about anything underneath. They each have ties in the back, making them easily adjustable. My husband and I thought they were nice for taking the kids out because they were very comfortable and not annoyingly constricting in any way. We got a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: MAJ

customer_reviews.title: Bacon looks great, Eggs not so much
customer_reviews.text: The bacon costume fits well, looks ok, and everyone loves it (who doesnt like bacon) The egg doesnt fit nearly as well, and isnt flattering to wear. It also looks more cheaply made than the bacon, and the person I was going to wear this costume with ended up not wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: D Iezzi

customer_reviews.title: BAE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me and the BAE (boyfriend)! :) Pretty cheap but what do you expect?!? It looked so cute in photos and everyone loved it. TOTALLY worth the $23 I spent... not sure you could find a less expensive costume that looked and fit as well as this, that really required no additional accessories or anything! Could be worn over any outfit but I wore heels and shorts to give my egg a cuter look ;)
customer_reviews.author: Clare Gephart

customer_reviews.title: This was hilarious and perfect. The backs are adjustable so they fit anyone
customer_reviews.text: This costume is the GOAT. My friend and I wanted to dress up, but we didn't want to be cold and we didn't want to spend a lot of money. This was hilarious and perfect. The backs are adjustable so they fit anyone. Perfect costume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well we did wait 'til the last minute. This costume did meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: With two days until the Halloween party and no idea what we were going to be, I hit up Amazon with some fast Prime shipping to get the job done. We were not the only couple who showed up as bacon and eggs, but our costumes were far superior to the other bacon and eggs couple. The costume construction and material was actually better than it looks online. If you are looking for a bacon and eggs couples costume, this will do the trick! Some bacon sent cologne would go well with this too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wiz

customer_reviews.title: Simple humor, great price, perfect for one day use
customer_reviews.text: Got to love a couples costume that is inexpensive and fun to take the kids trick or treating throughout the neighborhood. Received a lot of compliments and chuckles. Next year will buy a sombrero to go with the eggs and be "huevos rancheros" and nunchucks and a karate belt for the bacon and go as "pork chop" or if cold outside, wrap a blanket around shoulders and call it "pigs in a blanket".
customer_reviews.author: 3 to go

customer_reviews.title: Fun costumes
customer_reviews.text: Fun couples outfit. It fits my husband (6'2") and me (5'4") just peachy. The only small thing that may be annoying is that the egg costume has a funky seam that rubs against my chest, which causes a little irritation. The fix: don't wear the egg costume with a neckline that's anything lower than a regular T-shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Eh, its alright
customer_reviews.text: The product was really cheaply made and seeing it in person did not look that great. I only returned it because I no longer needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Katlin J.

customer_reviews.title: but the front looks nice. Okay
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I are bigger, 280 and 300 pounds respectively, and we could both fit in these costumes. The tie in the back looks cheap, and likely is, but the front looks nice. Okay, basic costume.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Garst

customer_reviews.title: Kinda big, especially around the shoulder area. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Kinda big, especially around the shoulder area. The manufacturer should consider making a smaller size for "petite" people. Not everyone has broad, man-shoulders. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: nozamA

customer_reviews.title: Fun costume with a little bit of a quality issue
customer_reviews.text: I get it. It's a cheap halloween costume. But with that being said, I should have to make repairs right out of the package when I open it. I had to sew one of the ties back on the bacon costume because it was barely hanging on by a thread (the sewing missed most of the tie entirely). Otherwise, it's definitely a fun couples costume and got lots of positive comments.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: comfy costume
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. My husband and I are not big on costume parties but we couldn't avoid going to this one, so I needed costumes that were not complicated or uncomfortable to wear. These fit the bill. The bacon fit very well for my husband, he's 6'3 and 190 lbs. I'm 5'5 170lb and the egg was a little big. But I just pinned the back a little and it fit fine. We even won 3rd place in the contest !!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Fun costume
customer_reviews.text: Had a blast being bacon and eggs with my husband at the Halloween party! Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: A cheap, silly costume
customer_reviews.text: This costume was okay. It's pretty cheap feeling, but what did I expect for the price? It's a good, silly costume for a couple to wear. It would fit almost any body type as it's really just a couple pieces of fabric with velcro on the sides. I didn't end up wearing it all night, but I imagine the size would get a little irritating after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Centers

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a costume that would fit without trying it on and this is a great value for 2 costumes. I agree with previous comments that you don't know what the bacon is unless you have the egg. The egg isn't great at sticking out like it does in the picture, but it is good enough. My husband wore the bacon and I wore the egg.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of boys

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect and over the extra layers we had to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Loves this and used it multiple times for different events. Fit perfect and over the extra layers we had to wear due to being so cold. Would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive costume!
customer_reviews.text: A Halloween costume doesn't get any easier than this! We got lots of compliments and laughs. And nobody had to try and figure out what we were.
customer_reviews.author: pegster79

customer_reviews.title: Easy No Fuss Couple Costume
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find a matching costume that isn't overtly sexual, doesn't have sweaty vision-reducing masks, and doesn't cost a small fortune. And as a bonus, they fit a lot of different sizes. And I also have to give kudos to the seller who got our costumes to us within days of ordering when we waited until the last moment thinking we could find all our costume demands locally.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and I to wear as we took our kids trick or treating. Got lots of compliments and laughs. The little kids loved it! They come really wrinkled but you can steam them out with a hand steamer no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Cute, last-minute couple's Halloween costume idea
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a couple's costume set... neither part stands well on its own. Of the two parts, the "egg" is the better-made of the two. While the front of the "bacon" costume is well made, the back fabric is a bit flimsy, and will not hold up over time and/or multiple uses. If you have any sewing skills, you might want to consider replacing it with something a little sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Opager

customer_reviews.title: Material irrated skin a bit from friction but affordable and funny couple costume.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material and fit a little odd (the "egg" costume really rode up and irritated my neck/shoulder region. I ended up pinning it to reduce friction irritation), but great price and hilarious couple costume. Fast delivery and great pricing.
customer_reviews.author: grwilkey

customer_reviews.title: BREAKFAST ANYONE?
customer_reviews.text: Received so many complements at our Halloween party. What better way to start the day or party than with Bacon and Eggs! These costumes did get a little warm after a while and a bit itchy on parts where it did touch the skin. I recommend wearing over a T-shirt or if not if you’re trying to be Slutty Bacon and Eggs ; )
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lam

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and you can dress however you want underneath
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wore this to a Halloween party it was the most talked about costume. Very fun and you can dress however you want underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Creative Costume
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a comfortable costume that doesn't take a lot of effort, this is it. Bacon was easy enough that i could get my husband to wear it without issue.
customer_reviews.author: jaymi

customer_reviews.title: 8 months pregnant and the egg fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, simple costumes for a duo. Good quality material. Held up nicely and could definitely be used again. They slip over and tie twice on the back. You can use the ties to make it a little tighter if you're a smaller person, but just expect it to be a little large if you're average size. I'm 8 months pregnant and wore the egg and it was perfect! The yolk sat nicely over my bump!
customer_reviews.author: Erin A. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price! Decent quality for a Halloween costume. The bacon piece fits more snugly than the egg.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Crowther

customer_reviews.title: Perfect couple costume
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this couple costume. It is super lightweight so we didn't get hot or sweaty. Lots of people laughed and enjoyed it, too. Best of all, it is very easy to put on and take off. This was a must because we have two little girls.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dahle

customer_reviews.title: Costume did the trick
customer_reviews.text: Fine for single use, but the front section of the egg was actually twisted when sewn to the tie on back piece. Carelessly put together to put it mildly. But, with this said, we got lots of cute comments and feel the costumes met our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Rollin' on the river

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & fun
customer_reviews.text: my man is 180lbs at 6'2" and it was snug around his shouders, but still fit. I'm 5'5" 125lbs and had plenty of room.Super cute & fun. Bacon colors are not as shown in picture, the white is actually tan colored.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED being the eggs to my bacon <3 my boyfriend and I wore these for Halloween and we loved them. They're not stiff, so they don't get in the way of much of anything, and go right over whatever you're wearing so there's no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Lexii Klopp

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit for children. For Adults I had to cut back and add stings. Worked out great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A full breakfast
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were the toast of the neighbors Halloween party! We will be wearing our costumes again this year. My only suggestion would be to have better velcro or closures on the costumes, but otherwise they are great and very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were pretty low when I ordered these, but they are pretty awful. They have permanent crease and fold lines that will never come out, and are so cheaply made that we were embarrassed to wear them. We sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: G. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best mediocre review here!
customer_reviews.text: What you get is what you paid. Not a bad costume if you're a couple that doesn't want to spend much. Both fit fine for my wife ( she's 8 months pregnant) and me (I'm 5'8). The costumes were also easy to sit and do a cartwheel in. I have no idea what the fabric is made of, but does it matter if you're wearing all black underneath?
customer_reviews.author: JG Torres

customer_reviews.title: Come for the bacon and stay for the eggs
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bacon costume. My wife thought the egg costume wasn't too flattering but she liked it because we were dressed up as a couple. The egg costume was not as well fitted as the bacon.
customer_reviews.author: Carl K Nayak

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume
customer_reviews.text: I realize the costume is a bit lame for adults, but we bought this costume for Trunk or Treat at our church. We had probably 1200-1500 kids come through and I have to say, the costume was a huge hit with adults and kids alike. My wife and I enjoyed it thoroughly and all in all this was a great costume!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a huge hit at the Halloween party. ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit at the Halloween party. It fit as expected for both me and my husband and we are both a little overweight. But BEWARE - My new nickname is now EGG and his is BACON LOL
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: but honestly - it looks like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars because the bacon really doesn't look very realistic... but honestly - it looks like the picture. So you get what they are advertising. But without the egg, the bacon was hard to pull off.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dezio

customer_reviews.title: Bring home the bacon
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've used these for 2 Halloweens now. They're just convenient to have for a quick costume with your wife.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Not the best costume, but a good quick fix
customer_reviews.text: We were dressing up as the Breakfast Club at my office Halloween party last year. I was supposed to make a bacon costume, but completely forgot until a few short days before. This costume did the job, but it really wasn't of great quality. The egg was floppy and just looked like a weird trash bag. Without the rest of my breakfast crew, i'm not sure if you would even be able to tell what the bacon costume was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for our weekend of Halloween parties
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our weekend of Halloween parties. The egg looked better than the bacon, but for $22, you can't complain. It didn't fall apart and people thought it was funny. Win.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn

customer_reviews.title: All Night Diner Couples Costume
customer_reviews.text: Perfect brunch couples costume, we made excellent "all-night diners." Material on the back is super cheap, but fine for a quick costume.
customer_reviews.author: Jack E Ay

customer_reviews.title: ... both my husband and I and we had a great time in them for our event
customer_reviews.text: They fit both my husband and I and we had a great time in them for our event! Thanks- very confortable and easy to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased,  for the price
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with the costume. It would got a wide variety of sizes. My husband and I are both above an extra large in clothing and they work great for us. They would also work for small to average sizes.
customer_reviews.author: debra turner

customer_reviews.title: FAST and FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Cute costume. My husband and I needed a quick easy costume to trick or treat with the grand kids. If you are looking to win a contest, this is not for you. I ordered this the last minute and it worked out perfect. Lots of good comments from the crowds a s well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great choice for Halloween or any costume party
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I are both larger people and we were both fit into these costumes perfectly! This is a great choice for Halloween or any costume party.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Liked it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Nice couple halloween costume for couples... Easy to put on and off and looks good and keeps its shape!
customer_reviews.author: Ashfia

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, no "yolk"!
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty much what I expected and a good price for two costumes! It was the only way I could get my husband to do a "couples" costume!
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: We had so many great reactions to this coues Halloween costume set
customer_reviews.text: We had so many great reactions to this coues Halloween costume set. And we LOVE that it comes from a company that offers affordable options.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Salter

customer_reviews.title: Great costume for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great costume for the price. First time I wore it and it kept it shape all the time. Comfy, did not feel like I was wearing it. Will use it next year!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great costumes!
customer_reviews.text: Costumes were a hit! I'm 6' 260lbs and the bacon costume fit fine. Quality was ok.
customer_reviews.author: OCLifer

customer_reviews.title: Great costumes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great costumes for the price. Easy on and easy off. Glad I purchased these at the last moment. I got one day delivery and it worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: The egg is very nice. The bacon appears to be raw - kind ...
customer_reviews.text: The egg is very nice. The bacon appears to be raw - kind of weird to have raw bacon and a cooked egg. We enjoyed the set as did others with a lot of nice comments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bacon and eggs!
customer_reviews.text: Cute. You need a steamer for these to get out the wrinkles. It worked well and they look like the photo. Just so u know, they are bare in the back- just nude lining there.
customer_reviews.author: S. Teller

customer_reviews.title: cute costume except mine came dirty..
customer_reviews.text: The costume was perfect. Price was great and my boyfriend and I got many compliments. I loved our costumes. The only reason I gave this review 3 stars is because I think the item shipped to me has been returned. It came DIRTY AND STAINED. I was really upset about it but I got it last minute and I needed the costume. I also got a weird rash around my neck from it I think.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Costume was great for the price. Runs somewhat small. Great for a Small to medium size adult.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Harris

customer_reviews.title: eggzactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and it was a decent hit. I tossed on a turkey hat, with the bacon shirt. . . . turkey bacon! The wife added devil horns to herself for , , , , deviled egg. YAY, success. :)
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, but it was a hit at the halloween party!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tache

customer_reviews.title: Really wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wanted to wear this for a Halloween party but it was too large and didnt fit right, the bacon really didnt look like a bacon. It was really wrinkled and no way to get it out. Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chibicat23

customer_reviews.title: Funny costume!
customer_reviews.text: This couples costume got loads of laughs while walking around! Pros -Funny looking costume -It's a tunic, so easy access. -Super lightweight! Cons -Cheap material -No backside to the costume -Creases easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sensorna Thach

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really fun costumes, but garbage quality (you get what you pay for).
customer_reviews.author: Anar Salayev

customer_reviews.title: Great costumes!!
customer_reviews.text: We were #brunch for Halloween! The costumes were absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: the breakfast club
customer_reviews.text: we won first place in the group category for 'The breakfast Club" on halloween night. we also had lots of fun wearing this costume.
customer_reviews.author: dbrat1966

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Fits me perfectly(5'5" and 6 months pregnant) and my husband who is 6'4"! This costume is hilarious. Would buy again if for some reason I had to lol
customer_reviews.author: deborah agnes henry

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a cheap easy costume. People thought it was funny too
customer_reviews.author: T&C

customer_reviews.title: A great couples costume.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I got lots of compliments on our costumes. It fit over our clothes, even over our jackets.
customer_reviews.author: MissMoveOver

customer_reviews.title: I was super happy with this
customer_reviews.text: This is not the fanciest costume, it did the job on Halloween! The costumes are a little big but not enough to complain. you can tie the bacon outfit in the back to get it a little tighter but not the egg. I was super happy with this, but like I said, nothing fancy!
customer_reviews.author: Shayda Galata

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: it is cute. Great for the price. easy to walk around. Would have gave it 5 stars but hard to get wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: Ok!
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. It's a costume. I think it needs to be steamed but its cute. Arrived quickly. Has ties on the back but you put it over your head. Reminds me of an apron. Not so big it's uncomfortable or heavy
customer_reviews.author: Trish K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Halloween Couples Costume!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great Halloween costume! Fit perfectly for me and my husband! As long as neither of you are over 210 pounds it will fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rene

customer_reviews.title: Bacon and Egg costume was great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wanted to purchase an inexpensive costume to wear to a dance. This turned out perfect and the price was great!!! Everybody loved the costumes. Glad we got such a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: The egg is pretty good but the bacon isn't great.
customer_reviews.text: The egg is pretty good but the bacon isn't great. I had bought it more for the egg so it served my needs but the bacon is really big and isn't really a funny or cool costume.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Costumes fit great. When they came they looked exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Derenne

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Price, Very Simple Costumes
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. GREAT for the 2 for 1 kind of price. Not the most detailed of costumes.
customer_reviews.author: simply1ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were the hit at our annual Halloween party. We love it
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rufrano

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect costume for a couple! Everyone loved it! The costume keeps it's shape well and wasn't too itchy!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Helton

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This was such a cute and easy costume. Especially since one of us is a major bacon lover. The costumes were very light so you didn't need to worry about getting too hot in them.
customer_reviews.author: bon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I wear an extra large tee shirt and this was two small for me. Didn't wear it at all.
customer_reviews.author: James C Chase

customer_reviews.title: Bacon and eggs - always a winner
customer_reviews.text: This coustume was well worth the money!!! Fit me, male size large and my wife, size medium! I rocked the bacon slices, she rocked the egg :)
customer_reviews.author: Mr Karlsson

customer_reviews.title: Well liked
customer_reviews.text: We got quite a few chuckles and comments while trick or treating with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Bturner

customer_reviews.title: Great costume but sometimes people looked at me like I ...
customer_reviews.text: My egg and I placed 5th at the Halloween contest we wore this to. Great costume but sometimes people looked at me like I was a piece of meat.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Costume
customer_reviews.text: Together we made a great team but apart people thought I was a sun. My husband alone again people couldn’t figure him out. But if you wear and stay together its really cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and fairly poorly made. But it made for a funny costume for my cousin and me to wear.
customer_reviews.author: M. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compliments wish the back looked as nice as the front it was a huge hit but the package costume was quality of the price
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: ... it was going to be and ot fit just fine. For anyone looking for a goofy couples Halloween ...
customer_reviews.text: The costume was exactly what is said it was going to be and ot fit just fine. For anyone looking for a goofy couples Halloween costume i would definitely recommend this :-)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are together - people had trouble determining what you dressed as.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good quick and easy couples costume
customer_reviews.text: We got a lot of compliments on this costume at our Halloween party. Only drawback is the bacon and eggs part of the costume is only on the front and the bacon is kind of awkwardly places on the shoulders. Other than that, great costume!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume, right price
customer_reviews.text: Got the costume very quickly. It worked well, is lightweight. Wore with jeans. Nice costume cause you don't have to do anything special like wear a mask, face-paint, etc. I was bacon...I looked like a scottish braveheart warrior when GF (egg) was not standing next to me.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: We won third prize at the Halloween party! As ...
customer_reviews.text: We won third prize at the Halloween party! As the egg, it was a sliming outfit for a 5', 158lb. lady
customer_reviews.author: emily m. holton

customer_reviews.title: It was OK but i wouldn't buy another
customer_reviews.text: I could take it or leave it. It definitely got some comments - it was perfect for me and my husband's first halloween together. it wasn't as sturdy as i imagined it, but it did the job. i had to stuff the front of the egg with a sheet so people could see the entire thing (i'm pretty thin so it folded over), but overall it was just as described.
customer_reviews.author: MelanieJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the simple Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the simple Halloween costume. We wore it to the Walt Disney World Halloween party and had many folks comment how much they love it., Made us feel like we made the perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not just for breakfast anymore! Bacon and Eggs!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun costume for us for Halloween! We loved it - and were a HIT
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We were a hit. We are not costume people but had to do something for my son's party, this worked out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: Just for fun!
customer_reviews.text: Nice costumes, as described, perfect for a last minute, great price, but you'll need to steam them.
customer_reviews.author: Costars

product_meta.title: Rasta Imposta Bacon and Eggs Couples Costume
product_meta.description: This classic breakfast combo makes a great couples costume set
